desc: 30 years of developing complete software solutions for surveying and mapping. Land surveyors, construction professionals, and civil engineers using total stations, GPS, and data collectors use our desktop and handheld software to increase efficiency and productivity.

layout.text: Welcome to the MicroSurvey Online Store

MicroSurvey has been developing complete software solutions for surveying and mapping for over 30 years.Land surveyors, construction professionals, and civil engineers using total stations, GPS, and data collectors use our desktop and handheld software to increase efficiency and productivity.
